message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item but a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it is worth more than $1200000 to us. However, considering the current market conditions and the value it could bring to someone like yourself, we are offering it to you for $1500000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we assure you that it will be a valuable asset that will provide substantial returns over time. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity beneficial for both of us.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market conditions and the value it could bring to me.
